name: Staff Boy
description:
Run through this strange temple. You can break things with your ancient staff.

You also have a power charged inside your staff: you can either use a yellow or a pink beam that changes the age of whatever it touches!                                                                       

Controls

Keyboard    /    Gamepad:

Move:    Left, Right, Up, Down arrow keys    /    Left joystick or D-Pad.
Jump:    Z or C    /    🅾️ (PICO-8) or 🅰️ (Xbox controller).
Staff:    X or V    /    ❎ (PICO-8 / Xbox controller).
AGE POWER:    Down + Staff button
Pause, Options:    P or Enter    /    Start

Credits

Design, programming, art and sfx by Quentin Picault.
Music from PICO-8 Tunes Vol. 2 (CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0) by Gruber.
